HediffDef.label: Nerotonin-4 healing
HediffDef.description: Rapid healing caused as an effect of the Nerotonin Type 4 virus. It is activated after prolonged time away from physical trauma.

HediffDef.label: Nerotonin-4 painkiller
HediffDef.description: A painkiller effect caused by the Nerotonin Type 4 virus.
